snippet: The Smithsonian’s Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum on the Upper East Side of Manhattan will get more money from the city to help pay for its renovation.
abstract: The Smithsonian’s Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum on the Upper East Side of Manhattan will get more money from the city to help pay for its renovation.

headline.main: Cooper-Hewitt Museum Gets $5 Million for Renovation
headline.print_headline: Cooper-Hewitt Museum Gets $5 Million From City
